reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 110/02: EXTENDING TERM OF VALIDITY OF INSPECTION STICKERS
reg_info.reg_name_text: EXTENDING TERM OF VALIDITY OF INSPECTION STICKERS
reg_info.act_under: Highway Traffic Act   Code de la route

content.content: 1. Despite subsections 8 (5) and 11 (6) of Regulation 611 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990, the term of validity of an annual inspection sticker is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the annual inspection sticker would cease to be valid under either of those subsections on or after the day this Regulation comes into force. O. Reg. 110/02, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Despite subsections 8 (5) and 11 (6) of Regulation 611 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990, the term of validity of an annual inspection sticker is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the annual inspection sticker would cease to be valid under either of those subsections on or after the day this Regulation comes into force. O. Reg. 110/02, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Despite subsections 10 (6) and 11 (8) of Regulation 611 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990, the term of validity of a safety inspection sticker is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the safety inspection sticker would cease to be valid under either of those subsections on or after the day this Regulation comes into force. O. Reg. 110/02, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Despite subsections 10 (6) and 11 (8) of Regulation 611 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990, the term of validity of a safety inspection sticker is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the safety inspection sticker would cease to be valid under either of those subsections on or after the day this Regulation comes into force. O. Reg. 110/02, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Despite subsection 9 (5) of Regulation 611 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990, the term of validity of a dump vehicle inspection sticker is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the dump vehicle inspection sticker would cease to be valid under that subsection on or after the day this Regulation comes into force. O. Reg. 110/02, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Despite subsection 9 (5) of Regulation 611 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990, the term of validity of a dump vehicle inspection sticker is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the dump vehicle inspection sticker would cease to be valid under that subsection on or after the day this Regulation comes into force. O. Reg. 110/02, s. 3.
